comment: Prof Boyle is VERY laid back and chill and she does not make it hard for you to pass. As long as you show up and participate your almost guaranteed an A. She doesn't do nonsense projects and things she feels is a waste of time. Very Easy class. LOVE HER

Best professor. Very knowledgeable and helpful. Really cares about students genuinely and wants best for each and every student. She is smart and like class discussions.Take her for seminar. You won't regret it. I wish she also taught a few business courses.
